name: ZAPPED! (mamaspike)
description:
Zap away your frustrations with this mega-ultra-old-school style 2D shooter! Re-live those carefree American 1980's teenage days in the local mall arcade! Blast those baddies back into deep space with ZAPPED!

Modifications:

Level 2

  1. Added simple maze
  2. Added background graphics
  3. Added Asteroid spawner
  4. Changed music
  5. Changed number of kills needed to win level

Level 3

  1. Added more complex maze
  2. Added background graphics
  3. Added Enemy Chaser spawner
  4. Changed music
  5. Changed number of kills needed to win level
  6. Added win screen at end of game
